metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2002 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
A vulnerability was found in the HCI sockets implementation due to amissing capability check in net/bluetooth/hci_sock.c in the Linux Kernel.This flaw allows an attacker to unauthorized execution of managementcommands, compromising the confidentiality, integrity, and availability ofBluetooth communication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
